sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
composed of some things
, so tiste stvari sestavni deli ali člani nečesa.

seg.quote: The book is composed of essays written over the last twenty years.
The National Committee was composed of 22 manual workers and 6 white-collar workers.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
composes music, a speech, or letter
, napiše glasbo, govor ali pismo.

seg.quote: Mr Morris sat down to compose his letter of resignation.

sense.def:
To compose oneself
pomeni umiriti se, potem ko smo bili jezni ali razburjeni.

seg.quote: She lay on her bed and cried and then she composed herself and went downstairs.
I felt calmer and more composed than I had in a long time.
